verses.text: Now \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, was a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, and \w honourable|strong="H5375"\w*, because by him the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H8668"\w* unto \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*: he was also a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \add but he was\add* a \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*.\f + \fr 5.1 \ft with: Heb. before\f*\f + \fr 5.1 \ft honourable: or, gracious: Heb. lifted up, or, accepted in countenance\f*\f + \fr 5.1 \ft deliverance: or, victory\f*

And the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* had gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by \w companies|strong="H1416"\w*, and had brought away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w maid|strong="H5291"\w*; and she waited \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w Naaman’s|strong="H5283"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft waited…: Heb. was before\f*

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*, \w Would|strong="H0305"\w* God my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \add were\add* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*! \w for|strong="H0227"\w* he would \w recover|strong="H0622"\w* him of his \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.\f + \fr 5.3 \ft with: Heb. before\f*\f + \fr 5.3 \ft recover: Heb. gather in\f*

And \add one\add* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* his \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus and thus \w said|strong="H1696"\w* the \w maid|strong="H5291"\w* that \add is\add* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w to|strong="H3212"\w*, \w go|strong="H0935"\w*, and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And he \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* with \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add pieces\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w changes|strong="H2487"\w* of \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w*.\f + \fr 5.5 \ft with…: Heb. in his hand\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Now when this \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, behold, I have \add therewith\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to thee, that thou mayest \w recover|strong="H0622"\w* him of his \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w read|strong="H7121"\w* the \w letter|strong="H5612"\w*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Am\add* I \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* and to make \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, that this \w man|strong="H2088"\w* doth \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto me to \w recover|strong="H0622"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*? \w wherefore|strong="H0389"\w* \w consider|strong="H3045"\w*, I pray you, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* how he seeketh a \w quarrel|strong="H0579"\w* against me.

¶ And it was \add so\add*, when \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, that he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore hast thou \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* thy \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*? let him \w come|strong="H0935"\w* now to me, and he shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

So \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with his \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and with his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w*.

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* in \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to thee, and thou shalt be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

But \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w thought|strong="H0559"\w*, He will \w surely|strong="H3318"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to me, and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w strike|strong="H5130"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w recover|strong="H0622"\w* the \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft I thought: Heb. I said\f*\f + \fr 5.11 \ft I thought…: or, I said with myself, He will surely come out, etc: Heb. I said\f*\f + \fr 5.11 \ft strike: Heb. move up and down\f*

\add Are\add* not \w Abana|strong="H0071"\w* and \w Pharpar|strong="H6554"\w*, \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than all the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? may I not \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* in them, and be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*? So he \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w* in a \w rage|strong="H2534"\w*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft Abana: or, Amana\f*

And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \add if\add* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* had \w bid|strong="H1696"\w* thee \add do some\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, wouldest thou not have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*? how much rather \w then|strong="H0637"\w*, when he \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to thee, \w Wash|strong="H7364"\w*, and be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*?

Then went he \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* himself \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* in \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, according to the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* like unto the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, and he was \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

¶ And he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he and all his \w company|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, now I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, but in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: now therefore, I pray thee, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.

But he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* whom I \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, I will \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* none. And he \w urged|strong="H6484"\w* him to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it;\add* but he \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*.

And \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall there not then, I pray thee, be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w two|strong="H6776"\w* \w mules’|strong="H6505"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*? for thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* will henceforth \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* neither burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* nor \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, but unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

In this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add that\add* when my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* there, and he \w leaneth|strong="H8172"\w* on my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and I \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* myself in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*: when I bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* myself in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* in this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*. So he \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from him a \w little|strong="H3530"\w* \w way|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 5.19 \ft a little…: Heb. a little piece of ground\f*

¶ But \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*, the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* of \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w spared|strong="H2820"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* this \w Syrian|strong="H0761"\w*, in not \w receiving|strong="H3947"\w* at his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* that which he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*: but, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I will \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w somewhat|strong="H3972"\w* of him.

So \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w followed|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*. And when \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add him\add* \w running|strong="H7323"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, he lighted \w down|strong="H5307"\w* from the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* all \w well|strong="H7965"\w*?\f + \fr 5.21 \ft Is…: Heb. Is there peace?\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, All \add is\add* \w well|strong="H7965"\w*. My \w master|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, even now there be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to me from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*: \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them, I pray thee, a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w changes|strong="H2487"\w* of \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*.

And \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Be \w content|strong="H2974"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* two \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*. And he \w urged|strong="H6555"\w* him, and \w bound|strong="H6696"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bags|strong="H2754"\w*, with \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w changes|strong="H2487"\w* of \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* upon \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5288"\w*; and they \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w tower|strong="H6076"\w*, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add them\add* from their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w bestowed|strong="H6485"\w* \add them\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and he let the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 5.24 \ft tower: or, secret place\f*

But he went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* before his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*. And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Whence|strong="H0370"\w* \add comest thou\add*, \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* no \w whither|strong="H0575"\w*.\f + \fr 5.25 \ft no whither: Heb. not hither or thither\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Went|strong="H1980"\w* not mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add with thee\add*, when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* again from his \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* thee? \add Is it\add* a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, and to \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w oliveyards|strong="H2132"\w*, and \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w*?

The \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* therefore of \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w* shall \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto thee, and unto thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. And he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* a \w leper|strong="H6879"\w* \add as white\add* as \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*.
